org.ucl.medicaldb

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ucl.medicaldb.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    the main database methods for the medical registry. It loads the patient data from a csv separated text file into an ArrayList of Patient objects

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String[] days 
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> errors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendPatientToDB(org.ucl.medicaldb.Patient newPatient)
      method to add a new patient to the ArrayList of current patients, and appends this to the db.txt
      void dumpDBtoFile()
      saves the ArrayList of current patients to the db.txt file, overwriting it in the process.
      void errorMessages(java.lang.String error)
      populates an ArrayList of error messages from the patient setter methods which is feeds to a JOptionPane in the MainScreen class
      void loadDBfromFile(java.lang.String fileLocation)
      loads default database file into an ArrayList of current patients.
      void removePatient(org.ucl.medicaldb.Patient toRemove) 
      org.ucl.medicaldb.Patient returnPatientFromId(java.lang.String id)
      returns a patient object from a known id.
      java.util.ArrayList<org.ucl.medicaldb.Patient> searchPatients(java.lang.String searchTxt)
      search method for the database.
